name: Visix the Unbowed
aura: Increases Ally DEF in Faction Crypts by 37%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has an 80% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 15%. Fills this Champion's Turn Meter equal to the amount the target loses.
skills.name: Flanged Mace

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

Also places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns.
skills.name: Sinister Allies

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Places a [Shield] buff on this Champion equal to 20% of their MAX HP for 2 turns.
skills.name: Single Combat
